summary: Website project with owner photo placement being configured to top-right position.

existing_features.title: Reposition the OwnerPhoto floating widget from the bottom-right corner to the top-right corner of the viewport. Update the fixed positioning in OwnerPhoto.tsx so it is anchored to the top and right edges of the screen (e.g., top-4 right-4), ensuring it does not overlap or conflict with the Navigation bar. Adjust z-index as needed so it remains visible above other content.

new_feature_requests.summary: Place owner photo at the top and right side of the website
